DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine analgesic efficacy safety N1539 subject undergoing abdominal laparoscopic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Study N1539 Subjects After Abdominal Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Planning undergo elective abdominal laparoscopic surgery involve single site/organ intraperitoneal metastasis suspect identify Use ketorolac contraindicate Use general anesthesia contraindicate Has medical condition could adversely impact subject participation Has diabetes mellitus glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) > 9.5 history prolong uncontrolled diabetes Body mass index ( BMI ) less 18 great 35 Has history intolerance allergic reaction nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , Cox2 inhibitor , aspirin salicylate Known suspected sleep apnea History Hepatitis B C Has psychiatric disorder impairs capability subject report pain Known chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) carbon dioxide retention chronic hypoxemia
